full_text: This classic lace blanket is an heirloom that will be cherished for years to come. Lion Brand Yarn Blanket is worked in one piece from corner to corner. All 3 versions of this blanket use the same pattern instruction, gauge & make the same size the blanket. The recommended needle size & yarn are the only difference. Check gauge with the yarn you choose if blanket size is important to you. L10157 Diagonal Eyelet Baby Blanket (2011) Martha Stewart CraftsTM/MC Merino (Article #5300) 5 balls Circular Knitting Needles 29 inches Size 9 90485 Treasured Heirloom Baby Blanket (2017) LB Collection® Cashmere (Article #483) 6 balls Circular knitting needles size 8 (5 mm), 29 in. (73.5 cm) long L70252 Diagonal Eyelet Baby Afghan (2018) Vanna’s Choice 4 Skeins Circular knitting needles size 8 (5 mm), 29 in. (73.5 cm) long
name: Ravelry: Diagonal Eyelet Baby Blanket pattern by Lion Brand Yarn
